byline.contributor: Vinod Sreeharsha contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro, and Paula Moura contributed reporting from Brasília.

abstract: Legal experts in Brazil are divided over whether budgetary obfuscatinons committed by government of Pres Dilma Rousseff amount to impeachable offense.
lead_paragraph: There is broad agreement that President Dilma Rousseff’s administration employed budgetary tricks, but legal experts are divided on whether that amounts to an impeachable offense.

headline.main: Brazil Impeachment Debate Hinges on a Thorny Legal Question
headline.print_headline: Impeachable Crime? Experts in Brazil Are Divided

snippet: There is broad agreement that President Dilma Rousseff’s administration employed budgetary tricks, but legal experts are divided on whether that amounts to an impeachable offense.
